data.1: GLORIFY THE NAME of your Lord, most high,
data.5: Then reduces them to rusty rubbish.
data.6: We shall make you recite (the Qur´an) so that you will not forget it,
data.7: Unless God may please. He knows the visible and knows what is hidden.
data.8: We shall take you slowly towards ease.
data.9: So remind them if reminder is profitable:
data.11: Only the wretch will turn aside,
data.12: Who will burn in the terrible Fire,
data.13: In which he will neither die nor live.
data.14: Surely he will succeed who grows in goodness,
data.15: And recites the name of his Lord and serves with devotion.
data.16: But no, you prefer the life of the world,
data.17: Though the life to come is better and abiding.
data.18: This is surely in the earlier Books,
data.19: The Books of Abraham and Moses.
